Class: ParsedHedString

ParsedHedString(hedString, parsedTags)

A parsed HED string.

Constructor.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
hedString string The original HED string.
parsedTags Array.<ParsedHedSubstring> The nested list of parsed HED tags and groups.
